field.label: Private API Key For Test
field.comment: you can find at https://admin.billwerk.plus under "Developers" >> "API Credentials".

field.label: Private API Key
field.comment: you can find at https://admin.billwerk.plus under "Developers" >> "API Credentials".

field.label: Prefilled phone number
field.comment: Use the customers phone number entered in the checkout to prefill in the payment window for mobile payment types

field.label: Auto Capture
field.comment: If enabled, the auto capture feature will create invoice automatically in Magento.

field.label: Create invoice in Magento when full amount is settled in Billwerk+
Initiated transaction type when using saved credit card
Order status when the payment is made
field.comment: Suggest to use "Processing"

field.label: Enable auto cancel of unpaid orders
Cancel the orders when order status
Cancel the orders after (minutes)
field.comment: Cronjob runs every 5 mins.

field.label: Change order status to cancelled if the customer is redirected to the cancel_url
Send order confirmation email after payment has been made
Allowed payments
field.comment: The new Vipps MobilePay payment method, which utilizes bank transfers instead of card payments, will replace the old MobilePay Online payment method. Please refer to Vipps MobilePay for more efficient transactions and a better conversion rate.

field.label: Use custom icons from the separated payment methods
field.comment: Set to "No" to use the default icons

field.label: Upload custom icon
field.comment: Leave empty to use the default icon.

field.label: Notice
field.comment: This payment method will be displayed in the "Window" display type.

field.comment: Leave empty to use the default icon.
